$comment: ITK Configuration Defaults - All values with their defaults and descriptions

ITK_MODE.description: Execution mode: 'live' (real AWS calls) or 'dev-fixtures' (offline testing)

ITK_AWS_REGION.description: AWS region for all service calls

ITK_LOG_GROUPS.description: Comma-separated CloudWatch log group names to fetch logs from

ITK_SQS_QUEUE_URL.description: SQS queue URL for triggering test cases

ITK_LAMBDA_FUNCTION_NAME.description: Lambda function name for direct invocation entrypoints

ITK_BEDROCK_AGENT_ID.description: Bedrock Agent ID for agent invocation entrypoints

ITK_BEDROCK_AGENT_ALIAS_ID.description: Bedrock Agent Alias ID (required with agent ID)

ITK_RESOLVER_CMD.description: Shell command that outputs targets.json for dynamic configuration

ITK_REDACT_KEYS.description: Comma-separated list of JSON keys to redact in outputs

ITK_REDACT_PATTERNS.description: Comma-separated regex patterns to redact in string values

ITK_LOG_DELAY_SECONDS.description: Extra delay before fetching logs (CloudWatch propagation)

ITK_LOG_QUERY_WINDOW_SECONDS.description: Time window in seconds for CloudWatch log queries

ITK_SOAK_MAX_INFLIGHT.description: Maximum concurrent requests during soak testing

ITK_SUPPRESS_VENV_WARNING.description: Suppress the 'not in venv' warning at startup
